room.title: Oral Examination
room.pageWillUpdate: The page will automatically update when a slot becomes available.
room.readyInstructions: Click the button below to start your oral examination. Make sure your microphone is working.
room.pleaseWait: Please wait while we connect you to the examiner.
room.examinationRecorded: Your examination has been recorded. An administrator will review the session and provide your results.

instructions.quietEnvironment: Make sure you are in a quiet environment
instructions.duration: The examination will last approximately 30 minutes
instructions.speakClearly: Speak clearly and take your time to answer questions
instructions.aboutCode: You will be asked about your submitted code
instructions.conductedInSwedish: The examination will be conducted in Swedish
instructions.conductedInEnglish: The examination will be conducted in English
